first.content: You're standing on the pier looking up across the front garden towards the house.
options: Take a closer look at the house

look_at_house.content: The house seems to have been doing fine all these years. Nothing has changed since your fammily used to live here in the summers. It's a bit rugged, but in in good shape giving the circumstances.

nostalgia.content: Your thoughs are about to wander of to those old times..|@@ But a more pressent matter grabs your attention.

branch.content: The large tree just to the right of the house has fallen over. || Hard to tell from here, but one of the larger branches could have smashed right through the porch windows leading into the study. ||@Tree trunk must have snapped during the spring storms.|@@Grans gonna be so pissed.
